trans-unit.source: Represents a civic address.
A civic address can include fields such as street address, postal code, state/province, and country or region.
trans-unit.target: Adres obywatelskiej mogą zawierać pól, takie jak adres, kod pocztowy, Województwo i kraju lub regionu.

trans-unit.source: A civic address for a location can be obtained from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> by using a class that implements <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>.
trans-unit.target: Obywatelskiej adres dla lokalizacji można uzyskać <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>za pomocą klasy, która implementuje <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>.</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> class provides a default implementation that returns the civic address that corresponds to a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, if the location source provides both coordinate data as well as civic address data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver>Klasa udostępnia domyślną implementację, która zwraca obywatelskiej adres, który odpowiada <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, jeśli źródło lokalizacji zawiera zarówno koordynować danych, a także adres obywatelskiej danych.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> </xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> returns a CivicAddress for the current location.
If the location source is unable to resolve the coordinate position to a civic address, <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli źródło lokalizacji jest nie można rozpoznać adresu obywatelskiej współrzędnych pozycji <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown>jest zwracana.</xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> class.
All fields are initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> class using address information.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"> </xref> przy użyciu informacji o adresie.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the first line of the street address.
A string containing the second line of the street address.
A string containing the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: Ciąg zawierający nazwę budynku lub numer.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the city.
A string containing the country or region.
A string containing the floor number.
A string containing the postal code.
A string containing the state or province.
At least one parameter must be a non-empty string.
trans-unit.target: Co najmniej jeden parametr musi być niepustym ciągiem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first line of the address.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia pierwszy wiersz adresu.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first line of the address.
If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets or sets the second line of the address.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia drugi wiersz adresu.

trans-unit.source: Returns the second line of the address.
If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String.Empty.>
Gets or sets the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia nazwę budynku lub numer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the building name or number.
If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets or sets the name of the city.
Returns the name of the city.
If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets or sets the country or region of the location.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia kraj lub region lokalizacji.

trans-unit.source: The country or region is typically represented by a two-letter ISO-3166 country code.
trans-unit.target: Kraj lub region jest zazwyczaj reprezentowany przez kod kraju normy ISO&3166; dwuliterowych.

trans-unit.source: Returns the country or region code.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca numer kierunkowy kraju lub regionu.

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets or sets the floor level of the location.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia poziom piętro lokalizacji.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the floor level.
If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> contains data.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"> </xref> zawiera dane.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> is equal to <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> is equal to <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postal code of the location.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia kod pocztowy lokalizacji.

trans-unit.source: Returns the postal code of the location.
If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets or sets the state or province of the location.
Returns the state or province of the location.
If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
Represents a <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> that contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"> </xref> który nie zawiera żadnych danych.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A> to verify whether a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> contains data.
To be added.
